headline.main: Oscars’ Board May Get More Star Power, if Not Diversity

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A new nominating process for the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences’ governing board has produced a more prominent, if not more diverse, field of candidates.
lead_paragraph: A new nominating process for the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences’ governing board has produced a more prominent, if not more diverse, field of candidates.
